ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] loss of lupine dagger...
ygData.msgSnippet: Tiffa, dagger is rarer than Jade Mace, but Jade Mace is a much more better weapon IMO. Eliza, at ur level, just stay in Karnor in the mean time while waiting
ygData.messageBody:
Tiffa, dagger is rarer than Jade Mace, but Jade Mace is a much more better
weapon IMO. Eliza, at ur level, just stay in Karnor in the mean time while
waiting for the GM, I think u will most likely get ur weapon back. Btw, how come
it's Randall Lee posting. =)

Damuo, a monk without a god.
56 Master
Divine Grace
Erollisi Marr








"Alex Tan" <atan@...> on 16/11/2000 11:12:37 AM

Please respond to sg-everquest@egroups.com








To: sg-everquest@egroups.com

cc: (bcc: Terence Tan/IHL-HQ/SIN/IHL)



Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] loss of lupine dagger...








I am so sorry bout it, Liz.......

BTW, most of the officers of DG will be at OS if they are not raiding, so
its easy for you to get them.

Tiffa Dancinsword from Divine Grace
Lvl 53 Illusionist on Erollisi Marr
